column1:   to the NDP-III I noted that Rwampara District budgeted to collect UGX.0.392bn during the year under review. The entity collected UGX.0.379bn representing 96.68% performance. I noted that the entity budgeted to receive UGX.1.51 Bn as transfers from other Government Units. However, only UGX.0.68 Bn was received representing 45% performance leading to revenue shortfall of UGX. 0.83Bn (55%).
